snippet.title: Space Mavericks  - Teaser (2023)
snippet.description:
Select a Commander, get your Spaceship and enter Battle Arenas to fight for your dream!

Space Mavericks is a real-time multiplayer game that recreates the classic artillery style of aiming and shooting by adjusting the angle and power. A game that mixes artillery games like Worms and Angry Birds with MOBAs like League of Legends or Dota.

Choose from several commanders with unique special abilities and create your strategy to defeat all enemies that dare to get in your way.

Join a competitive battle royale for up to 8 players or gather up to 4 allies to defy the most feared bosses in the Universe!

Socials & More:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Space_Mavericks
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/space_mavericks/
Telegram: t.me/space_mavericks
Discord: https://discord.gg/adjZYCP2C7
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@space_mavericks
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fire-gecko/
